mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, USER_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_ID, QNA_PW, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO FROM QNA ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (USER_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_ID, QNA_PW, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaId}, 0, #{qnaContent}, NOW(), 1, 0, #{qnaNo})
